modName: Lord of the Rings mod By Shadow0987
summary: This changes the hole of skyrim with lord of the rings adding all the characters into the game and Orcs everywhere in skyrim.  Everywhere you go you will be fighting also there are dark nights die easy but really strong also there is saurons tower is highly guarded by Orcs And hobbit hole homes in river-wood and much more.
descriptionHtml:
To start and see the characters in lord of the rings go and do the missions at the college also saurons tower is really strong also to see Sam and those 2 kids. Go to river-wood its changed to hobbit village also there are Orcs everywhere so go to the farm at white-run watchtower and get bilbo\'s sword out of his chest its real strong you will enjoy this one. You can find gollum on the college quests  

[add] hobbit holes at river-wood
[add] saurons tower at sleeping tree camp 
[add] orcs everywhere in skyrim
[add] a farm and weapons near watch tower
[add] lord of the rings characters at the college 
[add] gollum with the ring

 So people this mod just changes the looks and names of the charters at winter hold and add Orcs everywhere and gollum has the ring and changes river-wood to hobbit town That\'s all it Do-not changes any thing else  

little look at the farm you get out side home                              https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cPzKa3dN3sk
author: UltraDevice
